items.title: Six officers face misconduct hearing over Cardiff triple death crash
items.description: A group of five people were reported missing before being found in a crashed car two days later.

items.title: Woman who claimed to be Madeleine McCann found guilty of harassing family
items.description: Kate and Gerry McCann say, despite the guilty verdict, they "take no pleasure in the result."

items.title: Maccabi fan ban was due to hooliganism, say police
items.description: West Midlands Police did not previously reveal its reasons because "it wasn't deemed helpful".

items.title: ITV in talks to sell television business to Sky
items.description: The talks focus on ITV's free-to-air channels as well as its streaming service, ITV X.

items.title: From non-league to England call-up - who is 'Guernsey Grealish' Scott?
items.description: From the eighth tier of English football to the England squad - who is new Three Lions call-up Alex Scott?
